project_abstract.cdata: The Second Multisector Project will provide basic infrastructure, mitigate the social and economic impact of the structural adjustment process and generate employment. The project provides financing for:  (a) infrastructure sub-projects compatible with social and economic priorities (such as water supply, slum upgrading, and road rehabilitation); (b) technical assistance; and (c) training.
